About the Company: SPEL Semiconductor is an Integrated Device Manufacturer (IDMs) and Fabless Companies in the United States and Asia. SPEL offers Packaging Technology for Semiconductors used in diverse end-market applications including Communications, Consumer Electronics and Computing. SPEL provides full turnkey solutions that include Wafer sort, Assembly, Test and Drop-shipment services and also offers value added services such as Package Design, Failure Analysis and Full Reliability Test, Test Program Development & Product Characterization.
